description: This file defines a Python class 'CartesiaTools' that extends a 'Toolkit' class, providing methods to interact with the 'cartesia' API for voice listing, voice localization, and text-to-speech conversion. It manages external dependencies, handles API interactions, and integrates with other components like 'Agent' and 'AudioArtifact'.

classes.name: CartesiaTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with the Cartesia API, providing voice listing, localization, and text-to-speech functionalities.

methods.name: list_voices
methods.description: Lists available voices from the Cartesia API, returning a JSON string with voice details.

methods.name: localize_voice
methods.description: Creates a new localized voice based on specified parameters, returning a JSON string with the new voice info.

methods.name: text_to_speech
methods.description: Converts input text to speech using a specified or default voice, attaching the resulting audio to an agent or team.
